titleStmt.title: The grand case of conscience concerning the Engagement stated & resolved. Or, a strict survey of the Solemn League & Covenant in reference to the present Engagement.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Macock for Francis Tyton, and are to be sold at his shop at the three Daggers neer the Inner Temple, Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the three Daggers neer the Inner Temple
